snippet: The freelance photographer Mannie Garcia lost his White House press credential when he was arrested for taking photographs of police officers. The photographer and his lawyer are considering a possible federal and state civil rights suit, News...
abstract: The freelance photographer Mannie Garcia lost his White House press credential when he was arrested for taking photographs of police officers. The photographer and his lawyer are considering a possible federal and state civil rights suit, News Photographer magazine reported today.

headline.main: After an Arrest, Civil Rights Questions
